bug.author: davidzchen
bug.summary: Hamburger menu no longer appears on mobile
bug.description: I noticed that the hamburger menu no longer appears on mobile: <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5283042/11434590/a97d28de-9483-11e5-9587-70a6a1b45e79.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/martinwicke>@martinwicke</denchmark-link> probably knows more about the details here ...
We disabled the more involved navigation features on mobile to expedite moving to the new website.
Understood. I'll look forward to seeing the new website.
You are seeing the new website, which we launched without the hamburger menu in order to launch it quicker. :) It'll come back, eventually.
Will likely happen once we move doc systems again.
Will be dealt with in our move to new website infrastructure. We can close this as obsolete -- we won't work on this.
